channel.title: Server Set Up
channel.description: Hey guys so i'm making a server that is based off of nrs3 and it works 100% fine over localhost. The problem is when I try to implement no-ip or my ip it won't connect. There is no cmd errors and my port has been forwarded. Can someone give me a hand or explain what was done incorrectly?

item.title: Server Set Up
item.dc:creator: @allstarrevolutionz allstarrevolutionz
item.description:
@allstarrevolutionz wrote:

You have to use 127.0.0.1 to connect to your server if your hosting it on your own computer, everyone else uses the no-ip except you. Now if you vps host it eventually, you and everyone will connect to your vps’s ip address.

Read full topic
